news.description:
Welcome to the Public Test Build for Mid-Chapter 17! Please read the below for a quick summary of the new content you'll find during this PTB.

For a full list of patch notes, click HERE.

FEATURES & CONTENT
Updated Visuals
  • Visual updates & breakable walls added to The MacMillan Estate Realm (5 maps). Appearance rate of this Realm is increased for the first week of PTB.
  • Visual updates for Lockers, plus various other VFX.
  • 4K UI icons added for Character portraits and customization icons.

    • Balance Changes
  • The Executioner - Updates to Power and Perks
  • Perk Updates: Any Means Necessary, For the People, Thanataphobia, Mindbreaker, Cruel Limit, Slippery Meat, Hex: Huntress Lullaby, Technician, Pop Goes the Weasel, We're Gonna Live Forever
  • Perk Rarities: All Perks of a Tier now have the same rarity (Tier 1 = Uncommon, etc.)


    • KNOWN ISSUES
  • An invisible collision blocks the Coal Tower's basement.
  • Cars in The Macmillan Realm (specifically: Coal Tower and Ironworks of Misery) have placeholder textures.
  • Entity does not display on Hooks or Generators on Medium to Ultra Graphics settings.
  • The Autohaven Wreckers Realm has been disabled from map rotation due to current Killer Shack issues.
news.title: CHAPTER 17 PTB

news.description:
People of The Fog,

Thank you for participating in the Player Test Build!

Here’s a few things to know about your save data & progress in the Player Test Build:
  • Your personal profile (save data, inventory, currencies) has been copied from the Live servers to the PTB servers on September 24th, 2020 at 4:15:56 AM UTC. Any progress or purchases made on the Live servers after this date will not be reflected on the PTB.
  • All progress made during the PTB will not be transferred over to the Live servers.

    • You can leave feedback of your experience here:
    forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/categories/4-3-0-ptb-feedback
    See you in The Fog.

    -The Dead by Daylight team
news.title: PTB - Save Game & Progress
